Utilities package¶

csv_utils module¶

Functions used for working with csv files.

booksuggest.utils.csv_utils.save_csv(data, filepath, fieldnames)[source]¶

Saves data stored in a list of dictionaries to the given filepath.

Parameters:
  • data (List[Dict[~KT, ~VT]]) – Data to save.
  • fieldnames (List[str]) – Header of the csv file.

logging module¶

Logger setup functions.

booksuggest.utils.logging.setup_root_logger()[source]¶

Sets up the root logger with a custom configuration.

serialization module¶

Functions used for serializing python objects.

booksuggest.utils.serialization.read_object(filename)[source]¶

Reads an object saved in pickle format in the given file.

Parameters:filename (str) – File from which data should be read.
Return type:Any
Returns:Object that was saved in the given filename.
booksuggest.utils.serialization.save_object(obj, filename)[source]¶

Saves the given object in a file specified by filename in pickle format.

Parameters:
  • obj – Object to be saved.
  • filename (str) – Path to the file in which the object should be saved.
